item.title: Roll Your Own Debounce
item.description:
Debounce is a technique used to ensure that a function is not called more than once in a given time period. This can be useful when dealing with events that fire rapidly, such as scroll or resize events.

Alot of people import 3rd party libraries to handle this, but it’s actually quite simple to implement yourself. So, in this post, we’ll look at how to roll our own debounce functionality in JavaScript.
